The predominant quality of successful people is optimism.... Your level of optimism is the very best predictor of how happy, healthy, wealthy, and long-lived you will be. ~ BRIAN TRACY, Focal Point
We empower staffing companies and independent recruiters to grow sales and profits with back office payroll, billing, funding, and employer of record services nationwide.

Dane brings nearly 20 years of experience building sales teams to PeopleAxiom. As CEO and founder, he is the vision and creator behind a unique proven system for recruiting, developing, and retaining top performing sales people.

SourceMatch is a recruiting expert for the IT industry, as well as contract consulting and staffing for the State of Texas. With a particular interest in Health Information Technology, SourceMatch's consultants provide project management, business analysis, and other services for information technology and software development projects.Today’s marketplace favors flexible and timely access to the right talent without the commitment of permanent hires. Whether you’re trying to recruit the best talent on the market, improve engagement and recruitment effectiveness or temporarily extend your current workforce, SourceMatch will work with you in reaching your goals. We work tirelessly as your advocate.

As the President of Stark Talent, Dane has the honor and privilege of leading and coaching an outstanding and highly experienced team of recruiters and assessment specialists. His primary role is to facilitate healthy growth while staying true to the company's core values: Integrity, Innovation, Excellence, People.

The 24-member volunteer Board of Directors provides oversight for the American Staffing Association. ASA is the voice of the U.S. staffing industry. ASA and its affiliated chapters advance the interests of staffing and recruiting firms of all sizes and across all sectors through legal and legislative advocacy, public relations, education, and the promotion of high standards of legal, ethical, and professional practices.

I had the pleasure of working with Dane as an RVP of SOS Staffing.  He came to the executive management team as a real shining star and maintained that status during his tenure there.  He truly 'gets' the people and business side of the recruiting/staffing business which is rare at the executive level.  He has the ability to take very little infrastructure and build it into something extremely profitable.  His ability to build a team and motivate them to achieve their best is a wonderful asset to any organization.  I have been in the staffing business for over 25 years and have been continually impressed with his facts and figures in regards to our industry.  He is one of the most informed and educated people I know who has the passion to get the job done.  I truly enjoyed the collaborative management style Dane has with his co-workers and his individual team.  I am confident that he will be an asset at any challenge he chooses.

summary: People 2.0 Recruiter Services, is an employer of temporary and contract personnel placed on assignment by independent recruiters/staffing companies who choose to outsource employer of record, payroll funding, and payroll processing responsibilities. Independent recruiters utilize our services to expand their business to include temporary and contract placements while mid-size and large companies rely on us to increase their funding capabilities or as a resource to operate on a national basis.We are independently owned and operated and not affiliated with any staffing agency, recruiting firm, or bank. People 2.0 Recruiter Services is currently the only back office service provider endorsed by the National Association of Personnel Services. NAPS has chosen to recognize us in this way because of the professionalism and integrity that we have demonstrated to many NAPS members.
